title: Is it just me or are Runepages simply not in the store?
body:
Honestly, am I just blind?
Or are Runepages not in the store right now?

replies.body: Rune pages are there, but currently hiding.  You'll be able to find it through the Rune section, and switching Tier 3 to Show All on the left side panel.  Hope that helps!

Thanks for the response!

Yeah I figured that out only a few hours ago.
I really think that's something that should be made more visible though, honestly :P

I'm seeing more and more "Where are the rune pages" Topic these days. Do you guys have plans to move them in the shop and make them easier to find? Because as it stands I think their current location is.. well.. not very good if people just aren't find them.
It's found in the gameplay section of the store.Under the "Rune" category.
That's the problem... they're not there lol :l
